Government of Canada | Tender Notice

### Title 
#### Placing, Lifting, Removal, Maintaining and Servicing Buoys in the Province of New Brunswick

#### Mise en place, levage ou enlèvement, et entretien de bouées dans la province du Nouveau Brunswick

### Reference and Solicitation Information

* Reference Number: cb-705-38525465
* Solicitation Number: 30005456
* Publication Date: May 7, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: June 3, 2024 at 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: June 13, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: June 30, 2026
* Tender Status: Expired

### Business and Notice Information

* Procurement Category: Service (SRV)
* Government of Canada Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

### Business Requirement

The Canadian Coast Guard requires services related to placing, lifting, removing, maintaining, and servicing buoys around New Brunswick. These navigation aids support safe navigation of pleasure craft, fishing, and commercial vessels through Canada's waterways.

This solicitation may result in up to four contracts, one for each of the following streams:

* Northern New Brunswick (11 areas)
* Eastern New Brunswick (12 areas)
* Southern New Brunswick (9 areas)
* Tabustinac (1 zone)

Bidders must identify which stream(s) they are bidding on and submit a proposal that includes all areas comprising each selected stream. The duration of the contract is from contract award to June 30, 2026, with an irrevocable option to extend by up to two (2) one-year periods under the same conditions.

### Contracting Entity and Contract Information

* Contracting Entity: Fisheries and Oceans Canada / Canadian Coast Guard
* Address: 200 Kent St., Ottawa, ON K1A 0E6

### Contact Information

* Contact Person: Richard Soulliere
* Email: [DFO.Tenders-Soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:DFO.Tenders-Soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)
* Phone: (343) 576-2873

### Attachments

* Addendum 1 - 3 PDF files (all 4 languages)
* Request for Proposal - 2 PDF files (
